I thought we would have a hard time finding places to eat because zi am vegetarian.  What a find!We actually ate here twice.  The first time around I had the lasagna.  It was the best I had ever had!  My partner had the 3 mini burgers.  He scarves those up.  We had to have desert, and ended up having the best chocolate cake.  They make the best coffee and red tea.The second time around we brought a friend and ended up starting off with the hum as appetizer.  There were 3 types of hummus, all different and unique.  The crackers and breads were delish! What we had for dinner, the hamburger, the 3 mini burgers and the lasagna.  Had to have the coffee and red tea and of course the chocolate cake again.Some may find this place a bit more expensive than other vegetarian restaurants but it's well worth the cost for fresh and organic food.Highly recommend.
